Description: Fragment of lower wall of Attic black-glazed pottery open vessel, probably a bowl. Wholly glazed. Incised inscription on inside.
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 99)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 704, no. 622)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1871)
